title: Error sync node from some last blocks
body: #### System information Erigon version: 2022.99.99-dev-c03d5735 OS & Version: Linux Today about 50 minutes ago the node stopped syncing, on manual restart I got an error in TxLookup

error here: 
`WARN[06-30|19:25:18.845] [6/16 Execution] Execution failed block=15051225 hash=0x46252ba27024920def0df49be70059030447e62d76cd95bccf789218a29a9c96 err="could not apply tx 8 from block 15051225 [0x318d53b3cb96ef80172e0c6b63c61336a89f08811cf477aa959d614f8bce1656]: nonce too low: address 0x8729539b95216E4fdD82957C05766CfeBaf75960, tx: 4080 state: 4081"

Im trying `./interaction stage_stage --unwind 1000` but it didn't help.
This issue is stale because it has been open for 40 days with no activity. Remove stale label or comment, or this will be closed in 7 days.
This issue was closed because it has been stalled for 7 days with no activity.
